channel.description: Recent content in Alpert MD on Reeves & Jost Labs

item.title: Live simian immunodeficiency virus vaccine correlate of protection: local antibody production and concentration on the path of virus entry.
ADCC develops over time during persistent infection with live-attenuated SIV and is associated with complete protection against SIV(mac)251 challenge.
